tool_description: Schedules and coordinates survey distribution across multiple channels with timezone handling, optimal timing, and campaign sequencing.

campaign_configs.description: Array of campaign configuration identifiers to schedule

schedule_start.description: Campaign start time in ISO 8601 format

schedule_end.description: Campaign end time in ISO 8601 format

stagger_delivery.description: Whether to stagger delivery across time periods

retry_failed.description: Whether to automatically retry failed deliveries

error_messages: Invalid campaign configs: One or more campaign_configs IDs are not found or not accessible.
Invalid schedule times: schedule_start must be in the future; schedule_end must be after schedule_start.
Timezone not recognized: Use a valid timezone identifier (e.g., America/New_York, UTC).
Invalid stagger settings: stagger_interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes when stagger_delivery is true.
Optimization mode invalid: Use one of [none, timezone_optimal, engagement_optimal].
Concurrent limit exceeded: max_concurrent must be between 1 and 20.
Retry settings invalid: retry_interval must be between 5 and 1440 minutes when retry_failed is true.
Priority level invalid: Use one of [low, normal, high].
usage: Provide campaign_configs array and schedule_start time. Configure timezone, staggering, optimization, and retry settings as needed. The tool creates a coordinated distribution schedule across all specified campaigns.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created schedule
